original_question.question: How do the cultural and philosophical strands of posthumanism interact to reframe human subjectivity, and why does this reframing depend on expanding moral consideration beyond humans?

options.A: They reinforce human centrality but incorporate non-human tools as instruments to optimize human life.
options.B: They treat subjectivity as a fixed, human-centered property and use non-human actors only as external effects.
